entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Notcoin Token Launch Nears, Immutable's $50 Million Giveaway
entry.summary: The Notcoin launch is only days away, while Immutable is giving out rewards and Charles Hoskinson's studio released a game—not on Cardano.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Bitcoin Runes Mania and More Ethereum Legal Drama
entry.summary: As new Runes tokens dominated crypto, a proactive suit from Consensys against the SEC fostered a wartime mood among industry leaders.

entry.title: 'Cold Wallet' Review: The First Real Crypto Film
entry.summary: After a crypto exchange collapses, a group of Redditors set out to recover their funds from the CEO—by whatever means necessary.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Stumbles but Meme Coins Come Out Winning—Again
entry.summary: Bonk, Pepe, and Floki are among the biggest gainers of the past seven days.

entry.title: Sam Altman, Satya Nadella Join High-Powered AI Safety Board for Homeland Security
entry.summary: Twenty leading AI developers—including OpenAI, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and Google—pledge to help the US Department of Homeland Security protect critical infrastructure.

entry.title: ‘Notcoin’ Game Token Is Launching Soon—Here's How the Claim Works
entry.summary: The NOT token is dropping in a matter of days, Notcoin’s co-creator told Decrypt’s GG. Here’s what to expect from the claim process.

entry.title: Apple Releases 8 Small AI Language Models To Compete With Microsoft’s Phi-3
entry.summary: Competition in the AI space has started to shift from building the largest models to the smallest, most capable tools.

entry.title: Yuga Labs ‘Lost Its Way’ Says CEO as Bored Ape NFT Maker Reveals Layoffs
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club creator Yuga Labs is restructuring with an aim to get back to its smaller, scrappier early days.

entry.title: Ethereum Allies: Arbitrum Team Helps Optimism Avoid ‘High Risk’ Vulnerability
entry.summary: Reaching out to combat potential fraud, from one layer-2 to another.

entry.title: Elizabeth Warren Claims Crypto Is the ‘Payment of Choice’ for Child Abuse Material
entry.summary: The top senator wants to help the Justice Department and Homeland Security clamp down on the use of cryptocurrency in child exploitation.

entry.title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
entry.summary: UPDATED: Here's what you need to know about gaming airdrops and rewards around Notcoin, Immutable zkEVM, Saga, Illuvium, Apeiron, and more.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Bleed Badly as Skittish Investors Cash Out $218 Million
entry.summary: Nearly $218 million exited the formerly red-hot investment vehicles in the wake of a weak U.S. economic report.

entry.title: Coinbase, Uniswap Execs Praise Ethereum Giant Consensys for Taking On SEC
entry.summary: The heads of crypto industry titans like Coinbase and Uniswap are rallying behind Consensys in its fight to get the SEC to concede Ethereum is not a security.

entry.title: 'Heroes of Mavia' Delays Ethereum Token Unlocks as Price Falls 65% Since February
entry.summary: MAVIA surged in price soon after its February launch, but has plunged since. Now the Heroes of Mavia team is shaking up its plans.

entry.title: The Week in Polkadot: Web3 Foundation Backs Decentralized Storage
entry.summary: The Web3 Foundation backs decentralized storage project StorageHub, while Polkadot founder Gavin Wood launches a new podcast.

entry.title: More of FTX's Solana Has Gone to Pantera Capital in Auction: Report
entry.summary: More of FTX's Solana tokens have gone to Pantera Capital, as the bankrupt exchange's estate liquidates its $2.6 billion SOL holdings.

entry.title: UK Police, National Crime Agency Gain New Crypto Seizure Powers
entry.summary: Announcing the new powers, the UK government singled out privacy coins as "not conducive to the public good."

entry.title: Solana ‘Chapter 2’ Airdrops Could Cover the Price of the Phone
entry.summary: Solana Saga Chapter 2 pre-orders could have their price offset by new MEW and MANEKI airdrops.

entry.title: Ethereum Game 'MetalCore' Adding MON Token Rewards From 'Pixelmon'
entry.summary: Immutable zkEVM allies MetalCore and Pixelmon are teaming up, with the mech shooter set to add MON token rewards for completing quests.

entry.title: Payments Giant Stripe Reenters Crypto With USDC on Ethereum, Solana and Polygon
entry.summary: A decade after an early attempt to support Bitcoin payments, the company sees a stablecoin-powered future.

entry.title: Inside Sasha Stiles’ Experiential, AI-Infused NFT Drop with Bang & Olufsen
entry.summary: At a launch party for the collection in New York’s SoHo neighborhood, the artist broke down her latest art experiment, “Four Core Texts,” with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz.

entry.title: Immutable zkEVM Offering Up to $50 Million in Token Rewards to Ethereum Gamers
entry.summary: Ethereum users can earn IMX rewards for playing games, using exchanges, trading NFTs, and more on Immutable zkEVM.

entry.title: Rabbit R1 Reviews Herald ‘Standout’ AI Assistant After Disastrous Humane Pin Launch
entry.summary: Affordability, user-friendly design, and impressive capabilities help the latest AI gadget hop ahead of its scant competition.

entry.title: Franklin Templeton Enables Peer-to-Peer Trades of Blockchain Fund
entry.summary: Participants in the OnChain U.S. Government Money Fund can now swap shares directly.

entry.title: Consensys Sues SEC Over Attempts to Regulate Ethereum as a Security
entry.summary: Ethereum giant Consensys filed a preemptive suit against the SEC, revealing that it received a Wells Notice over MetaMask.

entry.title: Ohio Mulls Law to Protect Bitcoin Rights, Scrap Capital Gains Taxes
entry.summary: The bill would also require state pension funds to consider investing in Bitcoin spot ETFs.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dip as Inflation Figures Hamstring Rate Cut Hopes
entry.summary: The Fed’s preferred inflation gauge showed personal expenditures grew 3.7% in the first quarter.

entry.title: CyberKongz Reveal Bitcoin Runes Airdrop Details, 'Mad Rush' Behind Etching
entry.summary: The "DECENTRALIZED" airdrop of Bitcoin Runes tokens is nearing. The CyberKongz team shared exclusive details with Decrypt.

entry.title: Meme Coins Are Causing 'Damage' to Crypto, Says Andreessen Horowitz Exec
entry.summary: The CTO of VC firm Andreessen Horowitz, Eddy Lazzarin, argued that meme coins are "undermining the long-term vision of crypto."

entry.title: Bitcoin 'Epic Sat' From the Halving Sells for $2.1 Million
entry.summary: The first satoshi mined on Bitcoin after the halving, one of just four "epic sats" to date, fetched 33.3 BTC at auction. Here's why.

entry.title: CryptoPunk Sells for $12.4 Million in Ethereum—One of the Biggest NFT Sales Ever
entry.summary: The CryptoPunks NFT was the third ultra-rare Alien Punk to sell for over $10 million worth of Ethereum in the last two months alone.

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming Tokens Battered as Bitcoin Price Sinks to $63,000
entry.summary: Some of the biggest Ethereum tokens tied to gaming projects, such as Immutable and Parallel, have plunged over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Kokodi’s New NFT Collection 'The Masks' Is Set for Mint on Xterio Games
entry.summary: Kokodi Inc, a modern video game company, is the mastermind behind the Mask NFT Mint. It’s the project’s second collection for an upcoming extraction shooter game built by the developer.

entry.title: Interview: Hot 'Notcoin' Will Evolve After the NOT Token Launch
entry.summary: Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about how he envisions Notcoin's expansion and evolution after the token drop—into something akin to the "Netflix of social, viral games."

entry.title: Magic Runes
entry.summary: BTC stables at $66k, liquidations in narrow range. BTC funding again turns negative in bullish sign. ETFs net inflow after Grayscale moves to lower fees. BTC demand 5x vs supply post-halving: Bitfinex. SOL congestion issue now largely solved. Two SEC lawyers resign after ‘gross abuse of power’. Ripple fights to lower $2bn SEC fine. SAFE trades at $2.8bn FDV after OKX lists. MANEKI hits $150m on first day, China memes pump. Memecoins are ‘black hole you can’t ignore’. DeGods up 20%, may switch back to SOL. Magic Eden launches Runes platform ahead of time. Louis Vuitton gifts Pharrell jacket to NFT holders. Melania Trump launches necklace with SOL NFTs. Hoodie Punk trades for $620K.

entry.title: Luxury Watches, Designer Shoes Will Soon Trade Like NFTs: Arianee CEO
entry.summary: Arianee CEO Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel sat down with Rug Radio founder Farokh and Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at NFT Paris to discuss everything from the future of on-chain luxury to the secret hack to finding the best restaurants in France.

entry.title: Notcoin's Co-Creator Explains the Game's Token Delay—And When to Expect NOT Now
entry.summary: Notcoin co-creator Sasha Plotvinov spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai to discuss why the NOT token launch was pushed back from the original 4/20 target, when to expect the listing, and more.

entry.title: TON’s Justin Hyun Breaks Down The Importance of USDT Coming to Telegram
entry.summary: At Token 2049 in Dubai, The Open Network’s director of investments sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz to discuss what he sees as the game-changing integration of USDT onto TON, and his plans for getting Telegram’s 900 million users to start using crypto in the immediate future.

entry.title: Crypto Influencer Ansem Explains His Meme Coin Thesis and Why He’s Bullish on Bitcoin Runes
entry.summary: Ansem, the crypto trader who's amassed a sizable following on the back of meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) and other calls, chats with Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about his meme coin thesis, why he's bullish on Bitcoin Runes, and what he sees ahead for the crypto markets.

entry.title: Decrypt's Sander Lutz Braves the Dubai Floods for a Crypto Conference
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz reports from Dubai amid a historic storm that flooded the famed city, trudging through the streets to complete his essential task: Attending the Token 2049 crypto conference.

entry.title: Gold Beats Its All Time High
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) maintains its trend of reaching higher lows amidst choppy market conditions. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness another influx of $125 million. There's anticipation of Hong Kong approving ETFs for both Bitcoin and Ethereum (ETH) come Monday. Notable institutional investor BlackRock shows interest in Bitcoin. Recent filings reveal increased Bitcoin purchases by banks. A Bitcoin-friendly political party secures victory in the South Korean election. Analyst Kang predicts Bitcoin could surge to $80-100k by May. Meanwhile, Ethereum sees accumulation by stablecoin whales on the rise. A new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) aims to streamline signing requests. Solana (SOL) experiences a resurgence in activity, reaching yearly highs.

entry.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: On Thursday, Decrypt Media visited NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA to meet with the Engineering team behind the Europa Clipper before its launch to Jupiter's Europa moon in October.

entry.title: We Do A Little with Weesh
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we did a little something different. We took the man who is usually behind the camera and put him in front of it. We sat down with our producer Weesh to dive into how in fell in love with art and became a collector, how he met Andy and fun childhood memories together, his biggest wins in crypto, and so much more.

entry.title: Inside VanEck’s Crypto Takeover of the New York Stock Exchange
entry.summary: Worlds collide as Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz heads to the floor of the NYSE to witness a special closing bell ceremony hosted by VanEck in honor of Web3. Featuring Choose Rich Nick, VanEck Head of Web3 Matt Bartlett, and more!

entry.title: Wormhole Wednesday
entry.summary: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

entry.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
entry.summary: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.
